mean_cn: n. 流浪者，游牧民；  adj. 游牧的，流浪的
mean_en: a member of a group of people who move from place to place instead of living in one place all the time
word_etyma: nom牧场+ad表名词 → 游牧成员
sentence: The nomads are travelling through the desert looking for a new place to camp.
sentence_trans: 这两个游牧民在沙漠中行进，寻找着下一个落脚点。
